body:
Mahdi,

Basically your file was "almost" fine.

But:

You were missing both LB_LB and HB_HB components. Also i updated the file. Your definitions were pretty old. Also the HB_createHBZones the HB_Surfaces input wasn't flattened for some reason.

And the last thing after that the zone was recognized as OpenBrep. I change the tolerance in Rhino to 0.001 and reloaded the file. That fixed the issue and te zone is closed now.

See attached a working version.

-A.
